name: Product Review Sentiment Predictor - Python
body:
This tool predicts sentiment (opinions) from users comments (reviews) on a particular mobile phone product. Particularly, the sentiment on chosen project feature is predicted and results are shown in appropriate textboxes.
The opinion of the users are classified to three categories: positive, neutral and negative. Machine learning algorithms (classification algorithms) of Python scikit-learn tool are used to classify user reviews.
